definition: The word "sorgsam" refers to the careful and meticulous manner in which something is done. It is often used to describe the way in which a person handles or attends to a particular task or responsibility.

examples.german: Er handelte sorgsam mit seinem Geld.
Sie pflegte ihre kranke Mutter sorgsam.
examples.english: She took care of her sick mother diligently.

examples.german: Der Künstler arbeitete sorgsam an seinem Gemälde.
examples.english: The artist worked meticulously on his painting.

examples.german: Bitte behandeln Sie das fragile Objekt sorgsam.
examples.english: Please handle the fragile object with care.

examples.german: Die Lehrerin korrigierte die Aufsätze sorgsam.
examples.english: The teacher carefully corrected the essays.
